ui.title: Solo cluster two launch options
ui.subtitle: For familiarisation and experimentation with Alces Flight Compute.
ui.body: A time-limited cluster constructed with a t2.large login node and c4.large instances (3.75 GiB, 2 CPUs) provided for familiarisation and experimentation with Alces Flight Compute.  The compute estate initially runs on two c4.large spot instances (7.5 GiB, 4 CPUs), with autoscaling enabled to shut down idle nodes (a minimum of one compute node will be retained at all times).  The cluster operates the Open Grid Scheduler (SGE) job scheduler.

icons.tooltip: The compute power rating for this cluster is between 2 and 3 cu (compute units) per hour.
This cluster is intended to be ran for evaluation purposes only.  The cluster will run for a limited period of time before being terminated.

options.name: High
options.description: This launch configuration uses more compute units per hour to provide better durability for your jobs.
